snippet: Following an aggressive campaign by activists, a new $30 million ramp will be built to avoid bisecting playgrounds.
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio's administration announces that sanitation truck ramp three blocks away from Gracie Mansion will be rerouted, following effort by neighborhood groups who said it posed danger to local kids; campaign, which was undertaken by well-connected and well-financed activists from Upper East Side, also served as type of proxy for neighborhood residents' displeasure with de Blasio's administration.
lead_paragraph: Following an aggressive campaign by activists, a new $30 million ramp will be built to avoid bisecting playgrounds.

headline.main: New York City to Reroute Garbage Truck Ramp Planned on East Side
headline.print_headline: Amid Ire, City Says It’ll Alter Truck Ramp on East Side
